name: BOXING.WAD
description: This wad really isn' a big deal. I pretty much just made it for fun. Dont expect alot of replay value from this one. (sorry) But I do hope you enjoy it all the same! OK heres the description, This is a Deathmatch boxing game (please no guns allowed) You can either duke it out or have a chainsaw match! And please don't disturbe the spectators, as they have only come to see the match and you could instigate a riot!
